title: 39 Ways to Save the Planet: #8 Siberian Rewilding

cards.definition: A nature reserve on the Kolyma River south of Chersky in the Sakha Republic, Russia, Siberia, where an attempt is being made to re-create the northern subarctic steppe grassland ecosystem that flourished in the area during the last glacial period. The project is lead by scientists Sergey Zimov and Nikita Zimov.
